passage_text: As it stands now, the average custom home cost per square foot in the United States is between $70 to $230 depending on size, location, materials and labor. Custom Home Cost Per Square Foot Additional Factors. A custom home cost per square foot is going vary greatly according to the builders or contractor costs. It also varies by the type of materials the builder or contractor puts into the home and the shape of the home.

Cost to build a custom home is expressed in price per square foot estimates. In the housing market, we express the cost to build as a price per square foot. Therefore, a 3500 sq. ft. house that costs $700,000 would have a cost of $200.00 / sq.ft. Land is not included in this price. However, building permits, architectural and designer fees, as well as all construction-related costs are included in the price per square foot calculation. Read our article on the benefits of custom homes over production homes. On average, a custom home build with modestly upgraded features in Toronto will be $250.00 per square foot. You can also read our article on the various factors that affect the price per square foot of a new custom home.
